questions: I want to work for you
Is it possible to get a job with you?
I want to work as an editor
answers: If you want to get a job, please contact us via good-job@gmail.com with a mini-essay about yourself and attach your portfolio.

questions: I do not remember the password
I can't log into my account
answers: If you can't log in, use the 'Forgot your password?' under the login form. You will receive an email with further instructions. Check the Spam folder, sometimes letters end up in it.

questions: I want to delete my account
How do I delete my data
answers: If you want to delete your account, you can do it in Settings of your profile. Scroll the section to the area highlighted in red.

questions: Is it possible to unban for money?
Is it possible to pay for unban?
I want to pay for unban
My friend didn't do anything but got banned
answers: If you are banned, you have violated the rules of our community. When you enter the site, you can see evidence of your violations and a link to the violated rule. Unban is not for sale. If you have read the rules and evidence of your guilt and you still have complaints, use the form 'Not Guilty' under the ban message.

questions: We are late for a meeting
When will we sign a contract?
answers: Sorry, this chat is from SMM department is in, we do not know the answer to this question. Please contact directly the person you are working with.
